Question: This person moved to London in 1978 and lived in her mother's flat, as her mother then spent most of the year in Scotland.
Hints: This person also spent time working as a nanny for an American family living in London.
In 1998, Azermarka issued postage stamps with both Azeri and English captions, commemorating this person.
In it, a young this person lies comfortably in the lap of a unidentified man.
